Package maltcms.ui.charts

Class Summary
AChart<T extends Plot> Abstract base class for Charts of Type T extending Plot of JFreeChart.
AlignmentMapChart Creates a Plot displaying the mapping between two aligned time series.
BHeatMapChart Creates a chart with labeled domain axis, displaying a heatmap as backgroundimage.
CombinedDomainXYChart Combines Different plots (favorably XYPlots) to share a common domain, such that they are vertically stacked (default).
EPlotRunner This class is an extension of the normal PlotRunner and will generate a serialized file.
GradientPaintScale  
HeatMapChart Creates a chart with labeled domain axis, displaying a heatmap.
JFreeChartViewer  
MassSpectrumPlot Will create a XYPlot bar chart.
PlotRunner Callable which returns a JFreeChart object.
SpiderWebChart Chart displaying a plot of different variables organized as a spider's web.
VariableSelectionPanel  
XYBPlot This class extends the XYPlot to a Plot with a zoomable background image.
XYChart Chart to display one Variable's data, or additionally combined with domain values.
XYZChart Heatmap like chart, using to variable's values as indices for a third variable's value.
